name: EndStageRenalDiseaseESRD_HD_HCPCS
title: End Stage Renal Disease (ESRD)_HD_HCPCS
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for ESRD Condition.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute ESRD Condition for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: CKD Condition for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: ESRD HCPCS Codes that constitute the Primary ESRD Condition for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
